definition: to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable/item sold at a loss
sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable

sentences.english: Instead, he fell victim to his faith in the anti-fat propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 很可惜，他成了“反對脂肪”宣傳的犧牲品。
於是，基裏洛夫犧牲了自己。

sentences.english: He was endowed with the spirit of self-sacrifice.
Motorcyclists and bicyclists are often the victims in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 機車與腳踏車騎士常常是這種狀況的犧牲者。

sentences.english: E. g. He sacrificed his life to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他犧牲自己的性命去拯救溺水的孩子。

sentences.english: My husband can expense most of his lunches for work.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫會犧牲他大部分的午餐在工作上。

sentences.english: What we say is we should even be ready to make some sacrifices for a way-out .
sentences.chinese: 我們說我們準備做出些犧牲是爲了有個了斷。

sentences.english: In that sense, eery act is an act of self-sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 在這種意義上，每個行動都是自我犧牲的表現。

sentences.english: In 1927 he died on the gallows of the warlords.
sentences.chinese: 1927年他犧牲在軍閥的絞刑架上。

sentences.english: So many firefighters died that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天犧牲了許多消防員。

sentences.english: Countless revolutionary martyrs have laid down their lives in the interest of the people.
sentences.chinese: 無數革命先烈爲了人民的利益犧牲了他們的生命。

sentences.english: All offered up sacrifices to the minion of fortune.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人都情願爲這個命運的寵兒作出犧牲。

sentences.english: Would self-sacrificing emerge in natural selection?
sentences.chinese: 自我犧牲會在自然選擇中出現嗎？

sentences.english: My friend was a victim of hit-and-run.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友是一個撞了人就跑綽了的犧牲品。

sentences.english: In march forward in the process to have sacrificed servicewomen, everyone is enormously.
sentences.chinese: 在行進過程中又有女兵犧牲了，大家都很痛心。

sentences.english: DON'T use three or more at the expense of sounding too pompous.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用三個或以上的浮誇犧牲探空了。

definition: to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
